ISSUE.TITLE: Attachments download api
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We have registered a number using "register" api and we are able to sent message using "send" api. Also we could fetch messages/attachments using "receive" api and we are getting the response as below. For eg: [{"envelope":{"source":"+919xxxx","sourceDevice":1,"relay":null,"timestamp":1610517721588,"dataMessage":{"timestamp":1610517721588,"message":null,"expiresInSeconds":0,"attachments":[{"contentType":"image/jpeg","filename":null,"id":"**pwtcq-xxxx**","size":366267}],"groupInfo":null},"syncMessage":null,"callMessage":null,"receiptMessage":null}}] But we would like to know how to get/download the image by using attachments id "**pwtcq-xxxx**". Is there an api to fetch the attachments (image/video/pdf)?
